short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple search and replace content filter to protect users from harmful language

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search and replace content filter for Wikipedia that eliminates harmful words in order to protect our users. Hovering your mouse over the words tells you why that word must be eliminated from our lexicon.
